channel.title: Rename kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli whonix-xfce-installer-cli in Kicksecure 18
channel.description:
https://github.com/Kicksecure/usability-misc/blob/master/debian/usability-misc.links
In Kicksecure 18 which comes with LXQt, but there are kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli and whonix-xfce-installer-cli.
Will we rename kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli to kicksecure-lxqt-installer-cli or kicksecure-gui-installer-cli ? (rename whonix-xfce-installer-cli to whonix-lxqt-installer-cli or whonix-gui-installer-cli)
https://github.com/Kicksecure/usability-misc/blob/master/man/dist-installer-cli.1.ronn
`dist-installer-cli –help ` output description `Options: cli, xfce (default).`

item.title: Rename kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli whonix-xfce-installer-cli in Kicksecure 18
item.dc:creator: wrhjy
item.description:

master

/usr/bin/dist-installer-cli /usr/bin/virtualbox-installer-cli
/usr/bin/dist-installer-cli /usr/bin/kicksecure-cli-installer-cli
/usr/bin/dist-installer-cli /usr/bin/kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli
/usr/bin/dist-installer-cli /usr/bin/whonix-cli-installer-cli
/usr/bin/dist-installer-cli /usr/bin/whonix-xfce-installer-cli

/etc/profile.d/50_default_editor.sh /etc/zprofile.d/50_default_editor.zsh
/etc/profile.d/50_default_editor.sh /etc/X11/Xsession.d/50_default_editor

In Kicksecure 18 which comes with LXQt, but there are kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli and whonix-xfce-installer-cli.

Will we rename kicksecure-xfce-installer-cli to kicksecure-lxqt-installer-cli or kicksecure-gui-installer-cli ? (rename whonix-xfce-installer-cli to whonix-lxqt-installer-cli or whonix-gui-installer-cli)

github.com/Kicksecure/usability-misc

man/dist-installer-cli.1.ronn

master 
dist-installer-cli(1) -- download and import Whonix/Kicksecure VMs
=============================================

<!--
# vim: tw=75 cc=76
## ronn conversion of options description breaks lines horribly if longer
## than 75 chars.
## Copyright (C) 2025 ENCRYPTED SUPPORT LLC <adrelanos@whonix.org>
## See the file COPYING for copying conditions.
-->

## SYNOPSIS
`dist-installer-cli` [options]

## DESCRIPTION
**dist-installer-cli** is an installer that automates the download and import
of Kicksecure and Whonix VMs. It supports interfaces CLI or Xfce,
and allows users to choose their preferred hypervisor, such as KVM or VirtualBox.

## OPTIONS
This file has been truncated. show original

dist-installer-cli –help output description Options: cli, xfce (default).

Read full topic
